TEXT: Reduces #yHP by #b20%. NL Applies #yVulnerable when breaking #yBlock.
Increase #yBlock gained by #b33%. NL Reduces base damage by #b20%.
Upon reaching half #yhealth, gains #yStrength and also attacks its allies.
Hits twice as many times but base damage is halved.
TL Note: Doppel is added to last part of the monster name
Increases base damage by #b50%. NL Reduces #yHP by #b33%.
Heals for #b50% of unblocked damage dealt. Starts with #b70% of it's maximum #yHP.
Starts with #b[4/7/10] #yRegeneration. Starts with #b70% of it's maximum #yHP.
When its #yHP is at or below #b50%, will split into two copies of itself with its current #yHP.
Reduces base damage and health by #b25%. Copies your cards as you play them, playing one per turn.
Can't be targeted until all other enemies are dead.
